author: @AaronMOliver
text: Couldn't agree with number 1 more.  You really need to have a natural sense of curiosity to succeed in the field.  I'd add onto number 4: written communication.  Particularly since COVID I've seen a lot of previously face-to-face interaction turn into text and those with good writing skills could really take advantage of that!
